forum.name: T5D2 Discussion: Assessment Activities to Assess Mastery of Learning Goals
forum.intro:
Discussion: Your reactions to Aligning Goals with Your Course

Considering the information from  the website reading and your own assessment practices, please post your responses to the following:

  • Are any activities specifically targeted to assess your students’ mastery of their learning goals?  Why or why not? 
  • Please provide one or more examples of assessment activities you use to assess mastery of student goals – or ones you wish to use (based on what you have learned in this course).
  • Feel free to share any additional ideas or resources from your own experiences or from  your explorations of the Georgetown website.

After you post, please take time to review others’ posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on an Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
